body.name: Anti-Theft Doorbell Mount Video Doorbell Door Mount for Apartment Door Compatible with Ring Video Doorbell 4/3/3 Plus/2/1/2020 2021 Pro Pro 2 No-Drill Mounting Bracket Holder for Blink
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Wednesday, February 21 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Tomorrow, February 17. Order within 6 hrs 22 mins
features: 【Anti-Theft Design】We design this anti-theft doorbell door mount for most video doorbells. The Ring door mount provide a safe environment. The anti-theft doorbell door mount can 360°wrap your video doorbell for your family while keep your video doorbell away from stealing.

【Compatible Video Doorbells Mode】Most brands of video doorbells fit perfectly inside.Perfectly fit for Video Doorbell 1, Video Doorbell 2, Video Doorbell 3, Video Doorbell 3 Plus, Video Doorbell 4, Video Doorbell 2020, Video Doorbell 2021, Video Doorbell pro, Video Doorbell pro2 and most of video doorbells. Maximum 4 inches wide x 6.5 inches tall x 1.75 inches depth. Please confirm your doorbell model and size before you purchase.

【Compatible Door】This Ring anti theft doorbell mount is suitable for most kind of Anti-theft door, inward opened door, left or right opened door (outward opened door is not suitable), The thickness of the door must be between 0.6 inches and 2.3 inches. The door gap width over 0.06 inches. You can measuring your door thickness before ordering.

【No-drilll and Install】Put your video doorbell in the shell, adjust the fixed clip according to your door thickness,put the mount on the door side, Then fixed it via the two screw. It Does not need drill door or wall. Much easy.The product coming with detailed Installation Instructions and other necessary accessories.

【Package Include】: 1x video doorbell mount, installation instructions and various installation accessories. Any problem with received products or installation, please feel free to contact us, we will resolve it for you immediately.

reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A Must Buy
reviews.reviewText: This was a great purchase. I was looking for something affordable, yet effective for my Ring camera. This was perfect for the job! It’s easy to dissemble if you need to take the camera out to charge too!

reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars We feel safe in our new home!
reviews.reviewText: We love this ring doorbell system. We live in an apartment, so we have the mount that wraps around the door. We feel very safe and we love the video quality. We are extremely happy with this and recommend it to all of our family.

reviews.reviewText: absolutely perfect for an apartment! The only thing that’s a pain is you have to unscrew it every time it’s time for a charge!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I got it for my dad’s house. So glad I did. I can see when people come and when he leaves and comes back to the house.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 5, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Nothing but problems
reviews.reviewText: The little thing that holds the device on the door scratched the paint off my door.. the sensors appear to be blocked. My doorbell camera won’t pickup anything beyond 2 feet… Spent an hour talking to ring about my issues and the culprit appears to be this camera holder. Super disappointed.
